retreat.text: Buck up lads, we'll get them next time.

hull_90.text: I'm goin' ta blast ya into thin gruel!
Oh, they're goin' ta have to glue you back together...IN HELL!

hull_50.text: If you were huntin' trouble, lad, you found it.

hull_30.text: I feel like every bone in me body's broke!

victory.text: That's the way ya do it!
I don't think they saw that one comin'!
